projects.name: Icarus VR
projects.description: A Virtual Reality archery simulator with realistic gameplay elements.
projects.role:
Icarus VR is a virtual reality game that has fast-paced gun shooting and skill-based bow and arrow mechanics. Players compete in sky islands, each with its own unique features and challenges. The game offers a variety of game modes, such as Target Frenzy, Quick Draw, and Archery, each having a server-side leaderboard. Developed in Unity.

During the Spring of 2023, I worked as a on this project, implementing core gameplay mechanics and backend systems that manage server-side storage of player data.

projects.name: Changeling VR
projects.role:
Changeling is a VR mystery, first-person 3D platformer game built upon the idea of magical realism and a sense of unease and wonder. You play as Aurelia, a dream-walker who has the ability to see through the eyes of anyone she touches. You are tasked with helping this family figure out what is wrong with their child, and as you contact each member, you see through the lens of their hopes and fears of what the child is.

During the Summer of 2023, I worked as a to improve team workflow and general functionality of core gameplay mechanics. Notable inclusions that I worked on are the player's physics-based hands and the teleportation system. I also assisted with various needs from all of the development teams, and was responsible for building the executable at the end of development sprints.

projects.name: Dark Matter
projects.description: A 1-Bit Space Shooter taking inspiration from classic arcade games.
projects.role:
Dark Matter is a 1-bit space shooter game made in a week for the 1-BIT 2023 Game Jam. The project is made primarily in C++ and uses the raylib library for development support. Dark Matter garnered much attention during the period of the jam, garnering over 60 ratings and being the fourth most rated game.

During the Summer of 2023, I acted as a for this project, devoting a week of my time to make the gameplay feel and function the best that it can. This paid off, as Dark Matter was one of the highest rated games in terms of gameplay.

projects.name: Myne Graphics Engine
projects.description: A 2D Graphics, Audio, and Physics Engine using C++ and OpenGL.
projects.role:
Myne Graphics Engine is a game engine that fully supports rendering 2D bitmaps and glyphs, playing back .wav files, and performing physics calculations between objects via the built-in math functions.

For multiple years, I have worked on this project as a , iterating upon it to improve the engine's speed and user-friendliness. This was created from scratch using C++ and OpenGL to test my programming and computer graphics knowledge.
